brand.name: LogiSim
customer.dashboard.title: Your parcel console
customer.dashboard.lede: Monitor every parcel status, ship quickly, and keep monthly billing predictable.
customer.dashboard.links.send.title: Create shipment
customer.dashboard.links.send.desc: Set sender/recipient, speed, and payment method.
customer.dashboard.links.track.title: Track parcels
customer.dashboard.links.profile.title: Profile
customer.dashboard.links.profile.desc: Update name, phone, address, and payment preference.
customer.dashboard.links.contract.title: Contract / Monthly
customer.dashboard.links.contract.desc: Apply for contract, view billing cycle and balance.
customer.dashboard.links.payment.title: Payments
customer.dashboard.links.payment.desc: Pay invoices and review payment records.
customer.dashboard.summary.title: Overview
customer.dashboard.summary.emptyInTransi: No parcels in transit right now.
login.title: Login / Register
login.lede: Sign in to get your role permissions, or create a new customer account right away.
login.register.name: Name
forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.reason.roleForbidden: Your role does not have permission to access this page.
forbidden.reason.default: You don't have permission to do this. Please check your login status and role.
login.testHint: Quick test accounts (will auto-fill the correct password)
send.title: Create shipment
send.lede: Fill in sender/recipient info and package details.
send.pickup.title: Pickup method
send.pickup.hint: Home pickup needs date/time; store dropoff skips scheduling.
send.destination.title: Destination
send.common.recipientHint: Save or apply a common recipient (name / phone / address).
send.sender.title: Sender
send.sender.name: Sender name
send.receiver.title: Recipient
send.receiver.name: Recipient name
send.package.title: Package details
send.pickupSchedule.title: Pickup schedule
send.pickupSchedule.hint: Choose a date and time window for pickup.
send.pickupSchedule.notesPlaceholder: e.g., call before arrival, no elevator, gate pass
send.payReminder: Package created and unpaid; finish payment to proceed.
send.success.title: Created
send.errors.estimateRequired: Please enter start/end nodes, weight, and dimensions before estimating.
send.errors.estimateFailed: Estimation failed, please try again later.
send.errors.pickupType: Choose a pickup method (home pickup / store dropoff).
send.errors.requiredFields: Please complete sender/recipient name, phone, and address.
send.errors.weightAndSize: Enter weight and L/W/H (must be positive).
send.errors.pickupSchedule: Home pickup requires pickup date and time window.
send.errors.codNotAllowed: Recipient is not a system customer yet; please choose prepaid.
send.errors.receiverCheckFailed: Unable to verify recipient customer status.
send.errors.createFailed: Failed to create shipment, please try again later.
send.errors.mustEstimate: Please run shipping estimate before creating.
payment.page.title: Package payment
payment.page.lede: Shows created but unpaid packages. COD is handled by the recipient.
payment.banner.hint: Recommended: pay first. After successful payment, it will auto-redirect to tracking.
payment.guided.hint: You were redirected here after creating a shipment. Finish this payment first.
payment.guided.notFound: This payable item is not found. Please pick one from the list.
payment.guided.othersHint: Other unpaid items are view-only in guided mode. Switch to list mode to pay them.
payment.list.hint: Packages that require your payment. Tap to choose a payment method.
payment.focusNotice: Focused on the newly created payable item. You can confirm payment now.
payment.records.hint: Cash/card/bank/third-party payments appear here. Monthly billing packages are excluded.
payment.records.billDetailEmpty: No bill details or no packages in this period.
payment.errors.monthlyContractOnly: Monthly billing is available for contract customers only.
payment.errors.monthlyNotAllowedForInvoi: Monthly billing is not allowed for invoice items. Choose another method.
send.confirmation.home: Order created: Tracking {tracking} | Size {dimensions} / {delivery} | Weight {weight} kg | Payment: {payment} | Pickup: home pickup {date} {window} | Destination: {destination}
send.confirmation.store: Order created: Tracking {tracking} | Size {dimensions} / {delivery} | Weight {weight} kg | Payment: {payment} | Pickup: store dropoff | Destination: {destination}
track.title: Parcel Tracking
track.lede: List parcels related to you. Expand to see milestones and ETA.
track.filters.title: Filters
track.route.title: Route progress
track.route.empty: Route path is missing; cannot render progress.
track.tooltip.segmentFirst: Truck is leaving origin; not yet at first node.
home.title: Simulate shipping, transfer, and delivery
home.lede: Use a virtual map to mirror real-world cargo flows.
home.routes.title: Routes
home.routes.events: Events: Pickup, load/unload, sort, transfer, deliver, exception
home.routes.billing: Billing: Monthly cycle updates when parcels reach the hub
home.pricing.title: Pricing Model
home.pricing.hint: Layout placeholder; real pricing logic and APIs to be connected.
home.pricing.input.title: Input
home.pricing.input.copy: Dimensions (L×W×H), weight, delivery window, ship/pickup method, payment method.
home.pricing.rules.title: Rules
home.pricing.rules.copy: Base fee + distance/zone + weight/volume + time window + service handling fees.
home.pricing.output.title: Output
home.pricing.output.copy: Estimated fee, breakdown (each add-on), and reasons when a request is rejected.
home.highlights.virtualMap.title: Virtual Map
home.highlights.virtualMap.copy: Four rings: hub, transfer stations, stores, homes. Fleets run fixed zones.
home.highlights.pricing.title: Data-driven Pricing
home.highlights.pricing.copy: Service rules define allowed combos, rates, and special handling fees.
home.highlights.lifecycle.title: Lifecycle Tracking
home.highlights.lifecycle.copy: Log pickup, load/unload, sorting, delivery, and exceptions.
home.highlights.billing.title: Billing Friendly
home.highlights.billing.copy: Supports prepaid, COD, and monthly settlement for contract customers.
